title: Watch Videos: Van der Poel Crashes, Somersaults Over Handlebars Before DNF in Mountain Bike Return
content:
Two crashes in opening laps mark disaster return to mountain bike for cobblestone king in road toward Tour de France and MTB worlds.

Read the full article at Watch Videos: Van der Poel Crashes, Somersaults Over Handlebars Before DNF in Mountain Bike Return on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
